name: Gabi
overview: Gabi takes place in a country called Barbon. The protagonist of the game is a tiny animal known as Gabi. His task is to crack all the nuts between two stones and then place them in the storehouse. After cracking each nut various objects or creatures may appear, such as a helpful hammer or a key and a harmful spider or a spider's web. A surprise item may change to any of these things and it can be destroyed by a nut or a cracked nut.
